quality_assessment: Page documents planned features accurately with proper status disclaimers. References to draft specs (154, 155, 156) are appropriate for planned features but the specs don't exist in the codebase.

issues.description: Page references specs 154, 155, and 156 which do not exist in the specs/ directory. These appear to be planned specifications that haven't been created yet.
issues.should_be: Either create draft spec files or clarify that specs are conceptual designs not yet formalized
issues.fix_suggestion: Create placeholder spec files in specs/ directory or update source references to note these are design concepts

issues.description: Page lacks MkDocs Material visual enhancements that would improve readability
issues.current_content: Plain blockquote for status notice, no admonitions or visual indicators
issues.should_be: Use MkDocs Material admonitions for planned feature status, info boxes for key concepts
issues.fix_suggestion: Add admonitions: '!!! info "Planned Feature"' for status, '!!! tip' for best practices, tabs for alternative approaches

issues.description: Setup instructions reference template files that don't exist
issues.should_be: Clarify that these files will be provided when feature is implemented or provide location
issues.fix_suggestion: Add note that template files will be available upon implementation, or remove specific file references

positive_aspects: Clear 'Status: Planned Feature' disclaimer at the top sets appropriate expectations
Well-structured documentation with logical progression from overview to implementation
Comprehensive coverage of all three planned components (UI, deployment, workflow)
Detailed YAML examples for workflow configuration
Good explanation of versions.json schema with field descriptions
Includes local testing workflow for developers
Addresses browser compatibility and graceful degradation
Version retention strategy shows long-term thinking
Source references (even if to non-existent specs) show documentation methodology
improvement_suggestions: Add MkDocs Material admonitions for planned feature status using '!!! info' or '!!! warning'
Consider adding a timeline or roadmap section for implementation progress
Add cross-references to related pages like 'mkdocs-workflow.md' and 'github-actions-integration.md'
Include comparison with current (non-versioned) documentation approach
Add mermaid diagram for the deployment workflow architecture
Consider adding FAQ section for common questions about versioning

metadata.validation_focus: Auto-discovered page - check for drift and enhance with visual features
notes: This page documents planned features that are not yet implemented
Specifications 154, 155, 156 are referenced but do not exist in the codebase
No broken internal links found - page has no markdown links to other docs
Feature is described as 'in draft status' which matches reality
